sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT ATA.ACCT_ID GROWER_ACCT_ID ,AX.ALIAS_ID GLN ,ASP.ALIAS_ID SAP_ID ,AED.NAME_1 GROWER_NAME ,AED.MAILING_ADDR_LINE_1 ADDRESS ,AED.MAILING_CITY CITY ,AED.MAILING_STATE_CODE STATE ,AED.MAILING_ZIP ZIPCODE ,NULL CREDIT_ACCT_ID ,ATA.AGREEMENT_CODE CREDIT_TYPE ,NULL CREDIT_AMOUNT_APPROVED ,NULL CREDIT_AMOUNT_AVAILABLE ,ATA.BEGIN_DATE DATE_APPROVED ,ATA.SIGNER_ACCT_ID DEALER_ACCT_ID FROM AGCC.ACCT_TO_AGREEMENT_MV ATA INNER JOIN AGCC.ACCT_SALES_AREA_MV ASA_DEALER ON (ASA_DEALER.ACCT_ID = ATA.SIGNER_ACCT_ID) INNER JOIN AGCC.ACCT_SALES_AREA_MV ASA_GROWER ON (ASA_GROWER.ACCT_ID = ATA.ACCT_ID) INNER JOIN AGCC.ACCT_EXT_DNML AED ON (AED.ACCT_ID = ATA.ACCT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AGCC.ACCT_XREF_MV AX ON ( AX.ACCT_ID = ATA.ACCT_ID AND AX.SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE = 'GLN' AND AX.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN AGCC.ACCT_XREF_MV ASP ON ( ASP.ACCT_ID = ATA.ACCT_ID AND ASP.SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE = 'SAP' AND ASP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' ) WHERE ATA.AGREEMENT_CODE = 'FFLX' AND ATA.END_DATE > SYSDATE AND ASA_DEALER.CUSTOMER_GRP_CODE = #dealerGroupCode# AND ASA_GROWER.CUSTOMER_GRP_CODE = #growerGroupCode#
